thread.title: Chelsea FC news: Ashley Cole uses Chelsea branded stationary for scouting homework | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea FC news: Ashley Cole uses Chelsea branded stationary for scouting homework | Metro News

author: Simon Rice For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea FC news: Ashley Cole uses Chelsea branded stationary for scouting homework | Metro News
text:
A post shared by Ashley Cole (@theofficialac3) on Feb 15, 2017 at 6:01pm PST 
Something that stood out from the image was that two of the notepads on show were Chelsea branded. The use of the Blues’ stationary might be seen as a hint as to who he wishes to be scouting for in the future. Or it’s possible he pulled that trick seen in offices around the world of raiding the stationary cupboard just before leaving a job. Cole won a host of trophies with Chelsea, including the Champions League in 2012 (Getty)
